scripts.build:admin:skippable: test -f packages/admin/admin/lib/index.d.ts && echo 'Skipping Admin build' || $npm_execpath build:admin
scripts.build:cms:admin:skippable: test -f packages/admin/cms-admin/lib/index.d.ts && echo 'Skipping CMS Admin build' || $npm_execpath build:cms:admin
scripts.build:cms:api:skippable: test -f packages/api/cms-api/lib/index.d.ts && echo 'Skipping CMS API build' || $npm_execpath build:cms:api
scripts.build:cms:site:skippable: test -f packages/site/cms-site/lib/index.d.ts && echo 'Skipping CMS Site build' || $npm_execpath build:cms:site
scripts.build:cms:skippable: test -f packages/admin/cms-admin/lib/index.d.ts && echo 'Skipping CMS build' || $npm_execpath build:cms
scripts.build:storybook: pnpm recursive --filter '@comet/admin*' --filter '@comet/eslint-plugin' run build && pnpm --filter comet-storybook run build-storybook
scripts.dev:admin: pnpm recursive --filter '@comet/admin*' run clean && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @comet-admin
scripts.dev:cms: pnpm recursive --filter '@comet/cms*' run clean && $npm_execpath build:admin:skippable && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @cms
scripts.dev:cms:admin: pnpm recursive --filter '@comet/cms-admin' --filter '@comet/blocks-admin' run clean && $npm_execpath build:admin:skippable && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @cms-admin
scripts.dev:cms:api: pnpm recursive --filter '@comet/cms-api' --filter '@comet/blocks-api' run clean && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @cms-api
scripts.dev:cms:site: pnpm recursive --filter '@comet/cms-site' run clean && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @cms-site
